title: Stepping Forward: Urologists' Efforts During the COVID-19 Outbreak in Singapore.
text: Stepping Forward: Urologists' Efforts During the COVID-19 Outbreak in Singapore.

similar.title: Interrupting transmission of COVID-19: lessons from containment efforts in Singapore.
text: Interrupting transmission of COVID-19: lessons from containment efforts in Singapore.

Despite multiple importations resulting in local chains of transmission, Singapore has been able to control the COVID-19 outbreak without major disruption to daily living. In this article, we describe the combination of measures taken by Singapore to contain COVID-19 and share some early lessons learnt from the experience.
